faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.question1: How do I book a ticket?
faq.answer1: To book a ticket, first select the movie and showtime you want. Then pick available seats and complete your reservation.
faq.answer2: We accept a variety of payment methods, including credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and instant bank transfer (Sofort).
faq.answer3: Yes, you can cancel your booking up to 24 hours before the showtime at no cost.
faq.question4: Are there discounts for students or seniors?
faq.answer4: Yes, we offer discounts for students, seniors, and children. Please present a valid ID when booking.
faq.question5: How do I get my tickets?
faq.answer5: After booking, you can receive your tickets via email or pick them up directly at the cinema. Choose your preferred option during the booking process.
faq.answer6: Yes, we provide special rates for groups of 10 or more. Please contact our customer support for more information.
faq.question7: How can I contact customer support?
faq.answer7: You can reach our customer support via the contact form, by email at support@deinedomain.com, or by phone at +49 123 456 7890.
